mainText:
Today is a very sad day.

Steve Jobs to me was the greatest inventor and innovator of our time.  
I have been a loyal Apple customer for about 10 years and I have  
personally converted many friends and colleagues along the way. It was  
Steve's creativity and attention to detail that captivated me and drew  
me to Apple. I personally was not fortunate enough to have known him  
but I feel as if I did. I am very sad and my thoughts and prayers go  
out to his family.
author: Mark
